TopicTitle: My Kerbals are plotting against me...

Articles.Content:
So, I was playing KSP when I decided to have dinner. I minimized the game and watched some YouTube videos. I opened the KSP tab and...

All the Kerbals in the VAB were grouped together discussing something! The moment they noticed me the group split again and went on the normal animation loop...

I've never seen this before and was unable to grab a screenshot. Will try to get one though...

Awesome!

Perhaps it's a special thing they do after a certain time of no activity.

Maybe they were wondering where you were?

"What's the boss doing? We've been wandering here doing nothing -I mean, looking busy, for minutes now, and nothing's happened. "

"Perhaps they abandoned us"

"Can't we all take a tea brake? No one will know!"

"No, we are not allowed to leave until it's launch time, or the shift ends. Who else could document this stuff for the craft files?"

"Hey Jim, what you doin' Friday night?"

"Oh quick, the boss's back, look busy every one!"
